wikipedia_page.main: Omar Kader (born 29 April 1986) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Arbroath. He began his career at amateurs Spartans, where he spent seven years before moving to the Scottish Football League to represent Forfar Athletic in 2012. He played three seasons at Forfar before leaving to join Alloa Athletic, having impressed their manager while playing against them, but two months later he left to return to Forfar.

response: * Omar Kader – Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Arbroath
